Articles.Content:
I\'m new to KSP and love it. I\'ve always loved space and aviation and games and sims that are about these subjects. Love Orbiter but not very good at it. I really love the easy UI and setup of KSP. Plus I\'ve always wanted a nice looking, space game with capsules and modules and such. I tried the demo last year but recently purchased the preorder and just got the latest version that now includes separate 3D animated Kerbal models and its outstanding.

I\'m still a very poor engineer and mostly succeede at creating flying debris but its loads of fun.

Just saying hello and I have a question. I plan on reading through some onsite available tutorials but I have a graphics related question and don\'t know where to post it.

I\'ve seen youtube videos where the game casts real shadows. I don\'t see any shadows being rendered in my game and don\'t see an option for it in the settings tab.

Thanks.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Read this post: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=11693.0

Then start a new topic in Support with the requested information and someone will help you with your problem.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
